page.title: 19PENSIONER 80+ OF KNOCK
page.content: She feels proud & priviledged to live in the village where the people are genuine & helpful & united in their continual battle against the elements; winter snows & the Helm wind. She feels that having no bus service has brought the community closer together by encouraging them to share lifts into the town.She finds the local paper invaluable for keeping up with the "goings-on" round about.She is never at a loss for things to do & thinks that time seems longer without the distractions one meets in a town. Keeping her house & garden neat & tidy is a pleasure to her. She thinks that the holiday makers have brought a variety of different people into Knock & enjoys talking to them.
